p: To test the biological activity, the dried, crude extracts were dissolved in MEM complemented with 2% heat-inactivated fetal bovine serum (FBS) and dimethyl sulfoxide 2% (DMSO, Sigma-Aldrich, St Quentin Fallavier, France) to concentrations of 50 µg/mL (stem bark extracts) or 200 µg/mL (leaves’ extracts).
